title: Hospitality Competency Enhancement: Social Studies Projects Using Micro-Instructional Design Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design pedagogical instruments (educational tools) based on activity theory.
Learners can analyze minimal units (molecules) of social studies topics to concretize instructional design models.
Learners can develop formative assessment tools based on Problem-Based Learning (PBL) in a Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
